title: Note – 1)The plots abutting public roads having existing width of minimum 6m but less than 9m which are proposed to be widened to 9
clause_text: Note – 1)The plots abutting public roads having existing width of minimum 6m but less than 9m which are proposed to be widened to 9.0 m or more then permissible FSI shall be as admissible for 9m road width.
section: Floor Space Indices in Residential, Commercial and Industrial Zones

source_pdf.text_snippet: Note – 1)The plots abutting public roads having existing width of minimum 6m but less than 9m which are proposed to be widened to 9.0 m or more then permissible FSI shall be as admissible for 9m road
